CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

1. Monochromatic light: This is a type of light that consists of a single wavelength or color. Monochromatic light can be considered as a specific material or substance, in this context, it is the light source used for the external quantum efficiency (EQEs) measurement.

Therefore, Monochromatic light is the Material Name entity in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

1. J sc results: This refers to the J-Scans or J-Scanning results obtained from a photovoltaic measurement. J-Scan is a technique used to measure the current-voltage characteristics of a solar cell under different light conditions.
2. Accuracy: This is a property that refers to the degree of closeness of a measured value to the true value.
3. External quantum efficiency (EQEs): This is a property that measures the efficiency of a solar cell in converting external light into electrical energy. It is the ratio of the number of electrons collected by the solar cell to the number of photons that hit the cell.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Accuracy |
| External quantum efficiency (EQEs) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

1. J sc results: This refers to the J-Scanned results obtained from a photovoltaic measurement. J-Scanned measurements are used to determine the current-voltage characteristics of a solar cell. The J scans provide important information about the performance of the solar cell, including its efficiency and power output.
2. Accuracy: This is a qualitative property that refers to how close a measured value is to the true value. In this context, it refers to the degree of agreement between the J sc results obtained from the measurement and the results obtained from the external quantum efficiency measurement.
3. External quantum efficiency (EQEs): This is a quantitative property that measures the efficiency of a solar cell in converting external light into electrical energy. It is expressed as a percentage and is an important performance metric for solar cells. The external quantum efficiency measurement was used to confirm the accuracy of the J sc results.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. J sc results: This refers to the J-Scanned results obtained from a photovoltaic measurement, which is a quantitative property that provides information about the performance of a solar cell.
2. Accuracy of J sc results: This is a qualitative property that refers to the degree of agreement between the measured J sc results and the true values.
3. External quantum efficiency (EQEs): This is a quantitative property that measures the efficiency of a solar cell in converting external light into electrical energy, expressed as a percentage.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| J sc results obtained from a photovoltaic measurement |
| Accuracy of J sc results |
| External quantum efficiency (EQEs) |
